content: You’ll soon be ambushed by another Poisestone nearby, but this one is wreathed in blue flames and is much stronger. On the plus side, defeating it will earn you the Poisestone Spirit to transform into!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fright_Cliff_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Fright Cliff Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Squall Hideout' and the sub-subsection 'The Fourth Buddha’s Eyeball'.
The content is as follows:
You’ll soon be ambushed by another Poisestone nearby, but this one is wreathed in blue flames and is much stronger. On the plus side, defeating it will earn you the Poisestone Spirit to transform into!
